#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
 
int find(vector<int> *ar, int n);
int cache[1000];
 
const int maxio=1000000;
char buf[maxio], *s = buf + maxio;
inline char getc(void)
{
	if(s >= buf + maxio)
	{
		fread(buf,sizeof(char),maxio,stdin);
		s = buf;
	}
		return *(s++);
}
inline bool digit(char c) { return c >= 48 && c < 58; }
inline int input()
{
	char t = getc(); int n=1,res=0;
	while(t!='-' && !digit(t))
		t=getc();
		if(t=='-')
		{
			n=-1; t=getc();
		}
	while(digit(t)) { res = 10*res + (t&15); t=getc(); }
	return res*n;
}
 
 
int find(vector<int> *ar, int n)
{
	int &t = cache[n];
	if(t) return t;
	t = 1;
	for(vector<int>::iterator it = ar[n].begin(); it != ar[n].end(); it++)
	{
		t = max(t, find(ar,*it)+1);
	}
	return t;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	t = input();
	while(t--)
	{
		for(int a=0;a<1000;a++) cache[a] = 0;
 
		int m=input(), n=input();
		vector<int> ar[m];
		for(int a=0;a<n;a++)
		{
			int i=input(), j=input();
			ar[i].push_back(j);
		}
		int mx = 0;
		for(int a=0;a<m;a++)
			mx = max(mx,find(ar,a));
		printf("%d\n",mx);
	}
	return 0;
}
